title: Fitna by Geert Wilders
description:
This short film by Geert Wilders, which cowardly, politically-correct governments around the world tried to ban criticises Islam in a rather populist and superficial manner. Although it was produced by a right-wing Dutch politician and has not much merit, people around the world have the right to make their own judgements and should not surrender their powers of discrimination to those in power who kowtow to murderous religious fanatics. For this reason alone, you should watch and distribute this short film to all and sundry since freedom of speech is our most precious possession and is quickly lost if good men stay silent for evil men to prosper!


=== Also ===

Help stop sharia law in the UK: http://www.shariapetition.com/

For more information on sharia law go to: http://www.onelawforall.org/
